attributes.action: To recommission the Royal Yacht Britannia.
attributes.background:
This is in order to aid the royal family in promoting trade deals with countries outside the EU bloc.

The Britannia is an overt sign that Britain is open for business.

rejection.details:
We think that your petition is similar to the following petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167300

You may wish to consider signing this petition.
